name: anti-guide to field guides
description:
ANTI-GUIDE TO FIELD GUIDES

you head into the forest to create a field guide to its plant species. and well... you create something!

for more on objectivity & the lack thereof in lots of science check out freerads.org

big thanks to dialog choices & dialog prompts hack by Sean and Borksy by ayolland


originally made for the bitsy Sept/Oct field guide jam, but i misread the deadline and was a day late, oops!
